templates.title: AdGuard Home (HOST)
templates.name: adguard-home-host
templates.description: Use if you're going to use Adguard Home as a DHCP server. AdGuard Home is a network-wide software for blocking ads and tracking. After you set it up, it'll cover all your home devices, and you won't need any client-side software for that. Learn more on our official Github repository.
templates.note: Network Mode is host. Network-wide ads & trackers blocking DNS server.
